attributes.action: place immediate pressure on the South African government to grant temporary status and worker rights to Zimbabwean refugees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The South African government currently treats Zimbabwean refugees as economic migrants, consequently these refugees are subject to arbitrary deportation.  Granting temporary status would give the refugees sanctuary from the Zimbabwean regime and also give legal protection to the many thousands of refugees currently in South Africa who are yet to be deported.  The current system employed is inefficient and patchy in execution and inhumane in nature.
